1010011011110010 0111100110111111 1 -> sum: 0010000010110010, cout: 1
0111001110110111 0000110111000110 1 -> sum: 1000000101111110, cout: 0
1011000000101110 1001110011000010 0 -> sum: 0100110011110000, cout: 1
0101001010010100 1000111000011110 0 -> sum: 1110000010110010, cout: 0
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0
1111111111111111 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 1
